### restructureLoops() {#ac41caf6254221316cf74145aacc3da9a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LoopInterchangeTransform::restructureLoops (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; NewInner, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; NewOuter, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; OrigInnerPreHeader, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; OrigOuterPreHeader)</>}>
Update <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a>, after interchanging.

NewInner and NewOuter refer to the new inner and outer loop after interchanging: NewInner is the original outer loop and NewOuter is the original inner loop.

Before interchanging, we have the following structure Outer preheader
